data.rationale:
(from the pod)

    As menus are basically trees, Tree::Menu subclasses Tree::DAG_Node
    to provide a class which is useful for manipulating menu structures
    like the navigation on a website.

    The goal was to make it simple to define and manipulate menus in a
    class rich with tree-like methods whilst de-coupling it from any
    presentation. In the case of a website, it is anticipated that you
    will manage the presentation using your favourite templating
    language.
